titleStmt.title: The state or condition of the religious man on earth being a sermon preached at great Yarmouth, in the county of Norfolk, June 6th. 77. Also, Gods love to laps'd man. In a sermon preached at Northwalsham, in Norfolk, on Christmas Day, 1676. By R.S. M.A. and rector of Taverham in the county of Norfolk.
titleStmt.author: Scamler, Robert, b. 1653 or 4.

titleStmt.title: The state or condition of the religious man on earth being a sermon preached at great Yarmouth, in the county of Norfolk, June 6th. 77. Also, Gods love to laps'd man. In a sermon preached at Northwalsham, in Norfolk, on Christmas Day, 1676. By R.S. M.A. and rector of Taverham in the county of Norfolk.
titleStmt.author: Scamler, Robert, b. 1653 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by George Rose bookseller in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: The state of the righteous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
